unittitle_ssm: Joseph Hess collection of Brooklyn Bridge photographs
abstract_ssm: Included is one aerial view of the bridge, as well as two views of the bridge shown from the Brooklyn waterfront looking south towards the Manhattan cityscape. Piers and boats are also shown in the photographs.
